MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: The merrow can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The merrow makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or harpoon.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Harpoon
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.
